publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2678 Malcolm Chisholm: Community Care and Health (Scotland) Bill-That the Parliament agrees that the Community Care and Health (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Hugh Henry*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*

S1M-2678 Malcolm Chisholm: Community Care and Health (Scotland) Bill-That the Parliament agrees that the Community Care and Health (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Hugh Henry, Mrs Mary Mulligan
